p: Levels of nitrite/nitrate production in the paw tissue were determined as previously described by Costantino et al. [ 47]. Briefly, at the end of experiment, paws were cut and centrifuged to recover a sample of the edematous fluid. Blood was separated from the fluid sample and nitrite + nitrate (NOx) production, an indicator of NO synthesis, was measured [ 47]. Concentrations of nitrate were determined by comparison of regular sodium nitrate solutions prepared in saline solution at the OD550.
